Reference

All functions

calc_alpha()

Calculate Cronbach's alpha

calc_rbar()

Calculate the average correlation

calc_rit()

Calculate the corrected item-total correlation

check_comp()

Test if any correlation is greater than a specified value

check_df()

Test the appropriateness of an input

check_mrit()

Test the appropriateness of an input

check_msdf()

Test the appropriateness of an input

check_neg()

Test the appropriateness of an input

check_ovlp()

Test the appropriateness of an input

check_sclvals()

Test the appropriateness of an input

compare_sclvals()

Test the appropriateness of the relation between two inputs

disj_nci()

Multiple scaling in a disjoint manner using negative items too

disj_pci()

Multiple scaling in a disjoint manner using positive items

disjoint()

Multiple scaling -- the disjoint way

extr_core()

Extract the first two elements of an object

extr_core_nms()

Extract the names of two core items

extreb_itms()

Extract everything but the core

is.msdf()

Test for a multiple scaled data frame object

new_msdf()

Creator function to build a new multiple scaled data frame

nme_msdf()

Rename the components of a multiple scaled data frame

overlap()

Multiple scaling -- the overlapping way

ovlp_nci()

Multiple scaling in an overlapping manner using negative items too

ovlp_pci()

Multiple Scaling In An Overlapping Manner Using Positive Items

print(<msdf>)

Print method for a multiple scaled data frame

rvrs_note()

Notification message for a reversed variable

rvrs_var()

Reverse a variable

trust

German General Social Survey's Trust Items
